decision_conditions: Condition 2 of planning permission 18/00307/FUL is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:110-00 Site Location PlanTfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-110-02 Ground Floor Plan Rev ATfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-110-03 Plan and Roof Plan Rev BTfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-110-05 Ground Floor Plan West Rev ATfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-110-06 Ground Floor Plan - East Rev ATfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-110-07 First Floor Plan - East Rev ATfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-110-08 Roof Plan - West Rev BTfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-110-09 Roof Plan - East Rev ATfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-220-02 Building and Canopy Sections - Rev BTfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-330-01 - Long Section and Canopy Elevation - Rev BTfL-KT26RD-15-A-PL-330-10 Building Elevations - Rev BReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.All other conditions imposed on the original permission still apply.
description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 18/00307/FUL  (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of planning application 15/13087/FUL (Demolition of existing bus station and redevelopment with single storey replacement buildings comprising flexible retail uses and associated staff facilities. Installation of low level connecting canopy and new bio diverse roof planter.) to alter the proposed roof- new brick faced concrete vehicle barriers 1.2m high- benches set away from the kerb- new brick storage shed behind wall- top of canopy increase in height from 5.1m to 5.24m; and- walkway removed.
